translations: n．面貌，容貌：一个人的脸部特征或表情。
· The visages of the people in the painting are very lifelike.
画中人物的面貌非常栩栩如生。

sentences.sentence: In addition, he also frequently encountered a number of expressionless, enigmatic visages.
sentences.translation: 还有许多毫无表情、似笑非笑的脸，也是他在家里常常看见的。

sentences.sentence: The visages of European music and its connection with Chinoiserie of the 18th century are summarized in this paper.
sentences.translation: 本文探讨的主要内容是18世纪欧洲“中国热”背景下，欧洲音乐的面貌以及欧洲音乐与“中国热”的关系。

sentences.sentence: All people, in a word, would come stumbling over their thresholds, and turning up their amazed and horror-stricken visages around the scaffold.
sentences.translation: 总而言之，所有的人都会磕磕绊绊地通过门槛，在刑台四周抬起惊惶的面孔。
